game.name: Dashy Run
game.description:
One of the best adventuring games to play for free, Dashy Run is absolutely a treat for the online players. In this free online game, you have to help your hero to get through a variety of demanding objects. Guide him to pass through the dangerous objects without getting crushed on the way! Use brake at the right time to stop him from being collided with an obstacle. If you fail in doing so, your game will be over at that moment. So, timing is important when it comes to slowing him down in this cool time management game. 

The levels change generally, hence you also have to help your player to jump sometimes instead of slowing him down. Play with full of concentration and a dedicated mind to cover as much distance as you can in this endless running game for kids! Demonstrate all your talent to survive for as long as you can in this cool fun game! The running track is full of obstacles, so make sure to keep your eyes focused on the screen and help your hero wear the crown of a champion. Use the mouse of your PC to pause the progress of your character. Release him to being the race again!

Feel free also to play this cute online game in your mobile where you can pause your character by touching the screen of your phone! On the way, you have to dodge the spiked wheels, blocks of ice or falling apples and jump the fire. Itâ€™s time to show off your observation skills and help your character to reach a world record. You will be killed by most of the obstacles you meet on the way. So, be focused on the game and add or slow down your speed as required. Enjoy more running games at atmegame.com!!
